mcr_Host.name: mcr_Host
mcr_Host.description: String containing hostname of fault node.

mcr_Text.name: mcr_Text
mcr_Text.description: String containing text of the alarm.

occonectors_SoapConnectorLimit.name: occonectors_SoapConnectorLimit
occonectors_SoapConnectorLimit.description: SOAP connector session limit is exceeded.

occonectors_SoapConnectorLimit_Canceled.name: occonectors_SoapConnectorLimit_Canceled
occonectors_SoapConnectorLimit_Canceled.description: SOAP connector session limit is exceeded-Canceled

occonectors_XMLConnectorLimit_Canceled.name: occonectors_XMLConnectorLimit_Canceled
occonectors_XMLConnectorLimit_Canceled.description: XML connector session limit is exceeded-Canceled

occonectors_MYSQL_connector_CONNECT.name: occonectors_MYSQL_connector_CONNECT
occonectors_MYSQL_connector_CONNECT.description: No connection to MYSQL server 1.Check the connector's log file in order to find the reason for this alarm. 2.Check if there is ping to MySQL server. 3.Check MySQL logs for the possible reason for refusing connections from the connector

occonectors_ecm_CONNECTOR_PROBLEM.name: occonectors_ecm_CONNECTOR_PROBLEM
occonectors_ecm_CONNECTOR_PROBLEM.description: The alarm is turned ON if any connector is not working properly: 1.all subconnectos or all IPC connections are not working 2.it exited unexpectedly 3.it is disabled by ECM because of too much retries to start

occonectors_ecm_CONNECTOR_PROBLEM_Cancel.name: occonectors_ecm_CONNECTOR_PROBLEM_Canceled
occonectors_ecm_CONNECTOR_PROBLEM_Cancel.description: The alarm is turned ON if any connector is not working properly: 1.all subconnectos or all IPC connections are not working 2.it exited unexpectedly 3.it is disabled by ECM because of too much retries to start

mcr_BLRATING_connector_CONNECT.name: mcr_BLRATING_connector_CONNECT
mcr_BLRATING_connector_CONNECT.description: Alarm of type 'CONNECT' is ON when connector can't connect to MySQL server or when connected to it and lost connection later. This alarm is set OFF when connection is restored.

mcr_BLRATING_connector_CONNECT_Canceled.name: mcr_BLRATING_connector_CONNECT_Canceled
mcr_BLRATING_connector_CONNECT_Canceled.description: Alarm of type 'CONNECT' is ON when connector can't connect to MySQL server or when connected to it and lost connection later. This alarm is set OFF when connection is restored.

mcr_DMS_CLIENT_connector_CONNECT.name: mcr_DMS_CLIENT_connector_CONNECT
mcr_DMS_CLIENT_connector_CONNECT.description: Alarm of type 'CONNECT' is ON when connector can't connect to HTTP server or when connected to it and lost connection later. This alarm is set OFF when connection is restored.

mcr_DMS_CLIENT_connector_CONNECT_Cancele.name: mcr_DMS_CLIENT_connector_CONNECT_Canceled
mcr_DMS_CLIENT_connector_CONNECT_Cancele.description: Alarm of type 'CONNECT' is ON when connector can't connect to HTTP server or when connected to it and lost connection later. This alarm is set OFF when connection is restored.

mcr_SMPP_EX_connector_CONNECT.name: mcr_SMPP_EX_connector_CONNECT
mcr_SMPP_EX_connector_CONNECT.description: - All sessions for all configured clients are broken. - The connector exited unexpectedly. - The connector is disabled by ECM.

mcr_SMPP_EX_connector_CONNECT_Canceled.name: mcr_SMPP_EX_connector_CONNECT_Canceled
mcr_SMPP_EX_connector_CONNECT_Canceled.description: - The connector has at least one connected session.

mcr_SMPP_EX_connector_CLIENT_SESS.name: mcr_SMPP_EX_connector_CLIENT_SESS
mcr_SMPP_EX_connector_CLIENT_SESS.description: - One configured SMPP session is broken.

mcr_SMPP_EX_connector_CLIENT_SESS_Cancel.name: mcr_SMPP_EX_connector_CLIENT_SESS_Canceled
mcr_SMPP_EX_connector_CLIENT_SESS_Cancel.description: - All configured SMPP sessions are connected.

mcr_SMPP_EX_connector_CLIENT_CONN.name: mcr_SMPP_EX_connector_CLIENT_CONN
mcr_SMPP_EX_connector_CLIENT_CONN.description: - All sessions for one configured client are broken.

mcr_SMPP_EX_connector_CLIENT_CONN_Cancel.name: mcr_SMPP_EX_connector_CLIENT_CONN_Canceled
mcr_SMPP_EX_connector_CLIENT_CONN_Cancel.description: - At least one session is connected for this client.
